name: Mushroom Risotto
procedure: Toast rice in butter. Add wine and reduce. Gradually add warm stock while stirring. Fold in saut√©ed mushrooms and finish with parmesan.

name: Seafood Risotto
procedure: Toast rice in butter with garlic. Add wine and reduce. Gradually add warm fish stock. Add seafood in final minutes. Finish with parsley.

name: House Vinaigrette
procedure: Whisk mustard, vinegar, honey, and minced garlic. Slowly stream in olive oil while whisking. Season with salt and pepper.

name: Caesar Salad
procedure: Toss romaine with caesar dressing. Top with shaved parmesan, croutons, and anchovy fillets. Finish with lemon zest.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
procedure: Melt chocolate with butter. Whisk eggs with sugar and vanilla. Fold in chocolate mixture and flour. Bake at 425F for 12 minutes.

name: Vegan Buddha Bowl
procedure: Roast sweet potato and chickpeas. Cook quinoa. Massage kale with lemon. Arrange all in bowl. Drizzle with tahini dressing.

name: Grilled Salmon
procedure: Season salmon with olive oil, garlic, and dill. Grill skin-side down 4 minutes, flip and cook 3 more. Top with capers and lemon.

name: Tiramisu
procedure: Whip egg yolks with sugar, fold in mascarpone. Dip ladyfingers in espresso and marsala. Layer with mascarpone cream. Dust with cocoa.

name: Margherita Pizza
procedure: Stretch dough. Spread crushed tomatoes. Add torn mozzarella. Bake at 500F for 8-10 minutes. Top with fresh basil and olive oil.

name: Fruit Sorbet
procedure: Simmer berries with sugar and water. Blend and strain. Add lemon juice. Churn in ice cream maker or freeze stirring hourly.

name: Beef Carpaccio
procedure: Freeze beef 30 minutes for easier slicing. Slice paper thin. Arrange on plate with arugula. Drizzle oil, add shaved parmesan and capers.

name: Panna Cotta
procedure: Bloom gelatin. Heat cream with sugar and vanilla. Add gelatin and stir until dissolved. Pour into molds. Chill 4 hours. Serve with coulis.
